timeline.bodyText: Given that we have enrichmentType logic here, can we stick with using the enum instead of the string until but not including the repository layer
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: In this case I would need to move enum from web module to a level where it can be accessed from service module.
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.bodyText: Why getOrDefault? The key you're using is from the map's key set.
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina
Luke-Sikina
Luke-Sikina

timeline.bodyText: Adding control flow to your tests can be dangerous, mostly because a former coworker of mine may appear and ask you "who is testing your tests?", but I think this is fine.
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

timeline.bodyText: I'm glad this is getting removed, because this whole ID swap seems a bit janky. Can you explain why this is necessary, and what change in the future will obsolete this approach?
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: This is related to #6611. Currently all the fusion data is stored into mutation table with mutation molecular profile id. In future fusion data will be in its own table(structural variant) -> this is when all the import scripts are updated and existing data is migrated.
replies.author: kalletlak

replies.bodyText: I hope we haven't missed any TODO tags.
replies.author: n1zea144

timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

timeline.bodyText: Where is MolecularProfileNotFoundException  thrown? That's a checked exception, so I should get a compiler error when I remove it if something in the function body throws it, but I don't.
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: Looks like it is not required
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.bodyText: How many case sets could you potentially be iterating over? Iteratively calling a service seems like it could be a good way to run into performance issues.
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: It can be any, it is the number of groups in comparison. this would be the only way to do it as the response from getSampleCountInMultipleMolecularProfiles would be aggregated counts
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.message: Add new structural variant enrichment api

timeline.bodyText: Is there any validation on the MolecularProfileCaseIdentifier that the MolecularProfileID is valid (also for MutationEnrichmentService.java)
timeline.author: n1zea144

replies.bodyText: Looks like there is no validation. I'll add it
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.author: n1zea144

timeline.bodyText: It feels like we have lots of little areas in the backend where sections of code are identical except for a call or two to getPatientXXX/getSampleXXX.  Maybe its ok and introducing some design pattern to address it will only complicate the code...it just never sits well with me (I'm having a deja vu).
timeline.author: n1zea144

replies.bodyText: Me too. we should include this in refactoring
replies.author: kalletlak
